<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the relocation is PC-relative, the value to be encoded is the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RE.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/relocationentry/#a6fa763e1036861ba4581c5b3199b4fed">IsPCRel</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
